name: Word Wild
description:
A Brand New Puzzle From The Creators of Words of Wonders!

Test your vocabulary!
Discover Wild Animals!
Become a master!

Word Wild will test your vocabulary as you discover the wilderness filled with challenging levels. Begin your journey with the first collection and climb your way up to reach the final one. Each wild animal and level will get progressively harder and will be unique, thanks to the game’s rich word database. Drag the words without lifting your finger and solve the puzzle.

Enjoy simple and beautiful game design!
Variety of level designs will give you more fun during the play!

If you have any questions, feel free to contact us at: help@fugo.com.tr

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
